Main Technologies Our works About us
✕

Chatbot constructor in Telegram.

While developing the Telegram constructor, we faced an ambitious and difficult task to create a unique selling offer in the market, a constructor that won’t fall at peak loads, which is the main disadvantage of competitive platforms, and will have great functionality , as well as have a connection with the teleport service to create a single registration, quickly switch between services and automate the creation of funnels.
Platform functions: create bots and launch them / the ability to make a mailing list and many conditions, for example checking subscription on Instagram / communication with the service / set up payment.
An additional video about the platform.

Watch time is 1 minute

Service development technology:
Technology: back-end is made on AWS Chalice, front-end — in native js, since no frameworks were used before in the entire service. We decided to use vanilla js to make the whole service homogeneous. Bots are like lambda functions in aws. The basis is written in aiogram. The script is sent to dynamodb aws from the front in json format and is then used by the bot as an instruction to perform actions in each specific situation. All media files are uploaded directly to the bot, stored by us and can be used to create a funnel (it allows you to add media formats such as round videos and voice messages to the funnel).

The project was submitted for publishing and linking to the service of customer’s team. Development took about 6 months, It is longer than we expected.
